en.lang_these_pages_describe_how_you_can_ad: These pages describe how you can add new roles(clinic owner, doctor, medicine agent, care provider,front desk, pharmacy keeper etc). You must maintain rules and regulation authority will approve your role.
en.lang_authority_approved_rules_are_shown_: Authority approved rules are shown below and you can edit or update those Roles.
en.lang_clinic_owner:_you_can_create_a_new_: Clinic owner: you can create a new chamber by providing necessary information.
en.lang_doctor_role:_if_you_have_doctors_ro: Doctor role: if you have doctors roll place give all necessary information that need to authority
en.lang_medicine_agent:_if_you_are_an_autho: Medicine agent: if you are an authorised medicine representative from a medicine company you can buy this role for a specific postCode area.
en.lang_care_provider:_if_you_buy_a_care_pr: Care provider: if you buy a care provider role you should fill up the form below after being verified by the authority you can sell your service as a freelancer.
en.lang_front_desk_role:_you_can_buy_this_r: Front desk role: you can buy this role by giving a fixed amount of taka that's given below.
en.lang_va_keeper_you_can_take_pharmacy_kee: Pharmacy keeper you can take pharmacy keeper rule by filling up the application form below with necessary data.
en.lang_this_role_permits_you_to_sell_medic: This role permits you to sell medicine, collect prescriptions to patients and order online.
en.lang_regardless_of_being_a_doctor,_if_yo: Regardless of being a doctor, if you own/manage a clinic, you can buy this role. With this role, you can create a hospital/clinic/chamber. You can also set front-desk operators and doctors as well.
en.lang_if_you_are_a_registered_doctor_havi: If you are a registered doctor having a valid registration number, you can buy this role. You can create prescription and view patients previous history.
en.lang_if_you_are_an_authorized_medicine_r: If you are an authorized medicine representative from a medicine company, you can buy this role for a specific postcode area. You can see the medicine consumption statistics and keep medicine list up to date.
en.lang_if_you_have_a_specific_training_as_: If you have a specific training as a care-provider, you can buy this role to sell your service as a free-lancer. You can see various service-call related to your field and can bid for the service.
en.lang_if_you_are_a_front-desk_manager_or_: If you are a front-desk manager or a front-desk nurse at a health-organization (hospital/clinic/chamber), you can buy this role. You have opportunity to set doctors appointment (patient serial), set patients history, set patient vital sign and so on to keep the organization ready for patient.
en.lang_your_chamber_setup_will_be_done_her: Your chamber setup will be done here.
